title: T-Bone Walker Walker Crossing (The Blues District) (2011)(blues)

T-Bone Walker invented the guitar solo as we know it ? he was the guy who figured out how to make an electric guitar cry and moan. Born in Texas in 1910, he was a bluesman touring the South by the age of fifteen. As early as 1935, he was playing primitive electric-guitar models.
